short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy the hyperlinks, images and selected text converting to markdown format.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The extension allows you to convert the selected text, image or link to Markdown (including texts on rich editors).

The extension requires the following permission

1. `contextMenus`: to show option when right-clicking.
2. `activeTab`: to be able to access content on page.
3. `clipboardWrite`: to be able to write data to clipboard. It does not read your clipboard.
4. `scripting`: to be able to execute the conversion to markdown on browser.
